examples: there was an addition to property taxes this year
they recorded the cattle's gain in weight over a period of weeks

definitions.text: a change resulting in an increase
examples: the increase is scheduled for next month

definitions.text: a process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous or more important
the amount by which something increases
examples: they proposed an increase of 15 percent in the fare
he gave me an increase in salary

definitions.text: become bigger or greater in amount

examples: The boss finally increased her salary
The university increased the number of students it admitted
